pp2.2:3.3: makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṁ → makkhīyanā makkhīyitattā (si); makkhiyanā makkhiyitattaṁ (mr)
pp2.2:5.3: issāyitattaṁ usūyā usūyanā → ussuyā ussuyanā (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:16.3: asaṅgāhaṇā apariyogāhaṇā → asaṅgāhanā apariyogāhanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:18.3: sukatadukkaṭānaṁ → sukaṭadukkaṭānaṁ (bj, sya-all) | sammaggatā → samaggatā (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
pp2.2:46.3: tappetā ca → ayaṁ vuccati puggalo titto (bj); appetā ca (pts-vp-pli1)
